## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0face2ccd8f1c27b07f712f18f1597693625077fc84453a3adbf00abc15291a0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'product-custom-grid-columns' @ 5.4.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
